titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for US Department of Agriculture, Executive Operations, Office of the Assistant Secretary for Civil Rights for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for US Department of Agriculture, Executive Operations, Office of the Assistant Secretary for Civil Rights for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for the Department of Agriculture's Office of the Assistant Secretary for Civil Rights.
